definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: I was born on the village of Vivcani near Ohrid in Yugoslavian Macedonia.
sentences.chinese: 我出生在南斯拉夫的馬其頓的奧赫裏德鄉村。

sentences.english: The war years in Yugoslavia were pure hell,” Simic told USINFO in an interview August 9.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫的戰爭年代全然一場惡夢。

sentences.english: A city of northwest-central Yugoslavia northwest of Sarajevo.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫中部偏西北一城市，位於薩拉熱窩西北。

sentences.english: Former Yugoslavia president Slobodan Milosevic is trialed for war crimes.
sentences.chinese: 前南斯拉夫總統米洛舍維奇被判戰爭罪。

sentences.english: Vladimir Radmanovic was born into civil war in the former Yugoslavia.
sentences.chinese: 拉馬出生在南斯拉夫戰火紛飛的年代。

sentences.english: The official language is Slovenian, which is a member of the South Slavic language group.
sentences.chinese: 官方語言是斯洛文尼亞語，屬於南斯拉夫語言的一支。

sentences.english: The euro and the Yugoslav dinar are both accepted currencies in Kosovo.
sentences.chinese: 歐元以及南斯拉夫第納爾共爲科索沃的官方貨幣。

sentences.english: The Republic was one of the poorer areas of the former Yugoslavia.
sentences.chinese: 馬其頓共和國是前南斯拉夫較貧窮的區域之一。

sentences.english: A city of western Yugoslavia on the Dalmatian coast of the Adriatic Sea.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫西部城市，位於愛琴海的德莫森海岸。

sentences.english: The first chapter in the main body elaborates the origin of the United States' Yugoslavian policy.
sentences.chinese: 正文的第一章，論述美國的南斯拉夫政策的緣起。

sentences.english: Yugoslavs and people in other nations have observed similar days.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫人和其他國家的人都觀察到類似的日子。
1973年出生於南斯拉夫的諾維薩德。

sentences.english: So where did the South Slavs really come from?
sentences.chinese: 那麼南斯拉夫的人真正來自哪裏？

sentences.english: I'm from Qingtian. I once live in Jugoslavia .
sentences.chinese: 我來自青田，曾經在南斯拉夫居住過。

sentences.english: In Jugoslavia, I like summer and winter.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡夏天和冬天的南斯拉夫。

sentences.english: Yugoslav striker Savo Milosevic had headed Parma ahead.
sentences.chinese: 南斯拉夫前鋒米赫洛域頭球破網爲帕爾馬領先。

pinyin: Jie2 ke4 Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4

definition: Soviet Union, 1922-1991/abbr. for Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR) 蘇維埃社會主義共和國聯盟|苏维埃社会主义共和国联盟[Su1 wei2 ai1 She4 hui4 zhu3 yi4 Gong4 he2 guo2 Lian2 meng2]
East Germany (1945-1990)/German Democratic Republic 德意志民主共和國|德意志民主共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2]
